names.pinyin: jue ming xie gan jiang zhi tang
names.english: cassia seed drain the liver and reduce fat decoction
names.commonEnglish: Cassia Seed Drain the Liver and Reduce Fat Decoction

actions: Calms the Liver and anchors Liver Yang.
Reduces and guides out Food Stagnation, transforms accumulations and treats hypertension, elevated serum cholesterol, and coronary artery disease.
Promotes urination, leaches out Dampness and settles Ministerial Fire in the Kidneys by draining Damp-Heat from the lower Jiao.
Promotes urination, leaches out Dampness and strengthens the Spleen.
With Ze Xie, facilitates the removal of water and leaches out Dampness to treat stagnant water and Dampness.
With Che Qian Zi, for Lin syndrome, especially Milky Lin.
Clears Heat, facilitates the resolution of Dampness, clears Damp-Heat from the Liver and Gallbladder and relieves jaundice.
With Ze Xie, for Lin Syndrome, edema and distention.
Spreads Liver Qi and relieves Stagnation.
Clears Heat, transforms Dampness and promotes urination.
With Yin Chen Hao, for Early-Stage Damp-Heat Jaundice when Heat is stronger than Dampness.
Clears and disinhibits Dampness and Heat

symptoms: A bitter taste in the mouth
